name: The Indian Cancer Society
briefDescription: •	Indian Cancer Society is Leading the fight against cancer in India. •	Creating awareness among the general populace about cancer, its risk factors, the importance of early detection, treatment options and survivorship. •	Enabling Cancer detection for the poor through fixed and mobile cancer detection camps. •	Helping the poor in the treatment of cancer through various funding projects at different stages and levels, on an all India basis.•	Support, Rehabilitation and Survivorship for poor cancer patients. •	Research and Knowledge through the Indian Journal of Cancer and the Mumbai Cancer Registry.
